verbs.description: WASHINGTON — [ARG1: Acting Veterans Affairs Secretary Robert Wilkie] [V: is] [ARG2: President Donald Trump 's pick to permanently lead the beleaguered department] . Wilkie appeared in the White House press briefing room Thursday to accept a check for the amount of Trump 's first - quarter salary , which he donated to the agency . Trump revealed his decision during a prison reform ...
